full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### Tender Reference Number
WS3558041345

### Tender Title
Mercury Analyzer Supply, Delivery, and Installation

### Notice Type
Request for Proposal

### Tender Status
Expired

### Tender Overview
Environment and Climate Change Canada, National Laboratory for Environmental Testing – Burlington is soliciting offers for the supply, delivery, and installation of one mercury analyzer. The deliverables must be received on or before March 31, 2023.

### Mandatory Requirements
Supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by November 30, 2022, at 2:00 pm EST. All bids submitted after this deadline will be declared non-responsive.

### Tender Details
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Legal Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* ** regions of Opportunity**: Ontario (except NCR)
* **regions of Delivery**: Ontario (except NCR)
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity**: Department of the Environment (ECCC)
* **Contract Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC J8X 4B1

### Contact Information
* **Contact Name**: Nimuan, Kathleen
* **Contact Email**: [kathleen.nimuan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kathleen.nimuan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Notice URL**: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14568929

Note to bidders: All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted through the SAP Ariba platform. The tender notice in SAP Ariba, which includes additional information and instructions, can be accessed at the above URL. Only bids submitted in compliance with the specified requirements will be considered.  Only bids received by the specified deadline will be accepted.

# Tender Resources
* Tender Notice: SAP Ariba - National Laboratory for Environmental Testing - Burlington - Mercury Analyzer Supply and Installation
* Contact Person: Kathleen Nimuan (kathleen.nimuan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) 
Please contact us if you need any further clarification or remedial instructions. 8070 Transport Court, Lavaltrie, QC J0K 1R0 Canada.  Tel: 450-736-4131 Fax: 450-736-4133 Email:
